means: 吞没，包住( engulf的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He was engulfed by a crowd of reporters.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被一群记者团团围住。

sentence.Network_en: The little boat was engulfed by the waves.
An economic crisis engulfed the entire capitalist world.
sentence.Network_cn: 经济危机席卷了整个资本主义世界.

PerfectNetExp.abs: All has been engulfed by darkness ., 所有的一切都被黑暗所吞噬.
【词汇讲解】1. engulfed 陷入淹没The countryside was engulfed in a sea of mud left.
the fire , believed to have been caused by an electrical malfunction , engulfed the building at People's Friendship University .据说这场大火是由于使用电器不慎而引起的，大火吞没了友大的这座大楼。

list.abs: 看跌吞没、 空头吞噬（Bearish Engulfing） — 此K线图型态描绘在一个上升的趋势中，一根阳线之后，出现一根实体更长的阴线。看 …
·熊势吞噬（Bearish Engulfing）（2） ·乌云盖顶（Dark Cloud Cover）（2） ·射星（Shooting Star）（1） ·熊势孕妇（Bearish Hara…
floodwaters engulf a housing project in the Bajo Yuna community in central Dominican Republic .洪水吞没了多米尼加中部巴杰优那社区的一处在建的住房工程项目。
The mutation of engulfment genes can change the process of apoptosis ., 吞噬基因的突变可以改变凋亡细胞的进程.
The stormy sea engulfed the small sailboat ., 汹涌的大海吞没了那艘小机帆船.

entry.def: If one thing engulfs another, it completely covers or hides it, often in a sudden and unexpected way.

example.ex: A seven-year-old boy was found dead after a landslide engulfed a block of flats...
example.tran: 山体滑坡掩埋了一栋公寓楼，造成一名7岁男孩丧生。

example.ex: The flat is engulfed in flames.

entry.tran: 使陷入（某种感觉或情绪）
entry.def: If a feeling or emotion engulfs you, you are strongly affected by it.

example.ex: He looked around his dark, cluttered office and was engulfed by a feeling of emptiness.
example.tran: 他环顾自己昏暗杂乱的办公室，陷入一阵空虚之中。

means.word_mean: 1. rendered powerless especially by an excessive amount or profusion of something;

auth_sentence.content: Fire engulfed the Sony distribution centre in Enfield.
auth_sentence.res_content: Fire engulfed the Sony distribution centre in Enfield.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Fire engulfed the Sony distribution centre in Enfield.

auth_sentence.content: Three homes at this time were fully engulfed in flames.
auth_sentence.res_content: Three homes at this time were fully engulfed in flames.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Three homes at this time were fully engulfed in flames.

auth_sentence.content: The pontifical voice of a network editorial philosopher engulfed him.
auth_sentence.res_content: The pontifical voice of a network editorial philosopher engulfed him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The pontifical voice of a network editorial philosopher engulfed him.
